All Classes

Class Description
Attack
This class represents an Attack a character generates and contains a damage score.
AttackOptional
The class 'AttackOptional' is built only for the Optional Bonus Question in Assignment2, showing the possibility to replace subclass ('FireAttack' and 'FrostAttack') by using instance 'fields' (attackName) in the superclass (which is the class 'Attack' originally).
AttackReport
This class contains two pieces of information, the first is a text-based description of how a character defended against an attack, the second is the actualDamage the character received, note that actualDamage could have a negative value indicating healing.
BlueDragon
BlueDragon is a subclass of Characer, it inherites all the fields from the parent, also overides the attack() and defend() methods according to the rules of the game.
Character
This class represents a Character prototype, suitable for use in a Role-Playing Game.
CharacterGame
This class is the core of the program, it allocates characters into an array on start up then interacts with a user who can select characters (by array index) to run a combat simulation.
DefendTest
the DefendTest class is built only to demostrate that we could identify the attack types via fild "attackName" in Attack class
Dice
the enum Dice contains 7 and only 7 instances, every instance representing a dice: For example, FOUR means a dice with 4 sides from 1-4, SIX means a dice with 6 sides from 1-6, and so on.
DiceBag
This class contains utility methods to simulate rolling a variety of polyhedral dice, 4-sided, 6-sided, 8-sided, 10-sided, 12-sided, 20-sided and 100-sided.
FireAttack
class FireAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class RedDragon
FrostAttack
class FrostAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class RedDragon and BlueDragon
MagicAttack
class MagicAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class BlueDragon
Program
This class is only used to start the application, with method main.
RedDragon
RedDragon is a subclass of Characer, it inherites all the fields from the parent, also overides the attack() and defend() methods according to the rules of the game.
UserInput
This is a utility class with static methods to garner console input from a user, text as an entire line, an integer number, and decimal point number.
